tool.name: qiime2 diversity tsne

param.name: distance_matrix
param.label: distance_matrix: DistanceMatrix
param.help: [required] The distance matrix on which t-SNE should be computed.

param.name: number_of_dimensions
param.label: number_of_dimensions: Int % Range(2, None)
param.help: [default: 2] Dimensions to reduce the distance matrix to.

param.name: perplexity
param.label: perplexity: Float % Range(1, None)
param.help: [default: 25.0] Provide the balance between local and global structure. Low values concentrate on local structure. Large values sacrifice local details for a broader global embedding. The default value is 25 to achieve better results for small microbiome datasets.

param.name: learning_rate
param.label: learning_rate: Float % Range(10.0, None)
param.help: [default: 200.0] Controls how much the weights are adjusted at each update.

param.name: early_exaggeration
param.label: early_exaggeration: Float % Range(0, None)
param.help: [default: 12.0] Affects the tightness of the shown clusters. Larger values increase the distance between natural clusters in the embedded space.

param.name: random_state
param.label: random_state: Int
param.help: [optional] Seed used by random number generator.

tool.help:
QIIME 2: diversity tsne ======================= t-distributed stochastic neighbor embedding
Outputs: -------- :tsne.qza: The resulting t-SNE matrix.
|
Description: ------------ Apply t-distributed stochastic neighbor embedding.
|
